scripts.name: Display GreasyFork user registration time
scripts.description: If your script interferes with the interests of certain individuals, receiving malicious negative reviews is not surprising. Malicious negative reviews have two characteristics: First, the account is usually newly registered, and second, the review is given shortly after registration with little to no subsequent activity.
